QuestData.Title: Thunderlord for a Day
QuestData.Description: Pieces of a Thunderlord chain lay on the ground. It is of a very simple design, but effective.$b$bWith enough parts, even the most unskilled person could assemble a chain and grapple as effective as those used by the Thunderlord Grapplers.
QuestData.RewardText: With a quick tap of a hammer and a snip of the rings, the Thunderlord Grapple is as good as new.
